category: Herbs that Clear Heat and Purge Fire

action.primary: Calms the Shen and soothes the nerves
Clears Heat, resolves toxicity, cools the Blood and subdues hyperactivity of Liver Yang and lowers blood pressure

indications: Malignant tumors, leukemia, lymphosarcoma, hypertension, diabetes mellitus, primary thrombocytopenic purpura, swelling toxin of welling abscesses, sores and scalds

contraindications: Caution, the toxins may accumulate to cause degeneration of the nerve cells.
Side effects: alopecia, abdominal pain, nausea, constipation, muscle pain, finger numbness, fever.
Contraindicated for those with bone marrow deficiency due to chemo- or radiotherapy.

notes: This herb has been shown to inhibit the growth of cancer cells.
It is mainly used for Hodgkin's disease and acute leukemia in children.
